title: Nvidia, Microsoft, BlackRock part of $40B Aligned Data Centers deal
description: MGX, BlackRock's Global Infrastructure Partners and members of Artificial Intelligence Infrastructure Partnership will buy the company.
content:

title: Paul McCombs: Why AI Projects Fail
description: Artificial intelligence has moved from experiment to expectation. Across industries, boards now demand visible progress, and investors treat AI maturity as a proxy for competitiveness. Competitors announce breakthroughs in generative AI, predictive analytics, and autonomous operations. Yet behind the headlines lies a sobering truth: most AI initiatives fail to scale. title: It's About to Get Harder for AI Chatbots to Pretend to Be Human
description: This week, California governor Gavin Newsom signed a handful of new laws that regulate artificial intelligence and social media. Among them is SB 243, which requires that chatbots provide clear and conspicuous notice that they are not a real person.
